entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of snow. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain or wet snow near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023
